definition: A type of employment arrangement where an individual works for a reduced number of hours compared to a full-time position, typically less than 40 hours per week. It is commonly used to describe a part-time job or work schedule.

examples.english: She is looking for a part-time job.

examples.german: Teilzeitbeschäftigung ist in vielen Branchen üblich.
examples.english: Part-time employment is common in many industries.

examples.german: Er arbeitet Teilzeit, um mehr Zeit für seine Familie zu haben.
examples.english: He works part-time to have more time for his family.

examples.german: Die Firma bietet flexible Teilzeitmodelle an.
examples.english: The company offers flexible part-time models.
